message.content:
cs.CV, cs.HC, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM

Reasoning: 
- cs.CV (Computer Vision): The paper uses a multi-modal dataset of RGB plus Depth recordings, and proposes an extension of Dynamic Time Warping (DTW) to recognize behavioural patterns of ADHD through gesture recognition. 
- cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction): The proposed methodology is applied in a clinical context to provide support to clinicians in the diagnose procedure. 
- cs.LG (Machine Learning): The paper proposes an extension of DTW using one-class classifiers and models the set of gesture samples using either GMMs or an approximation of Convex Hulls. 
- cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence): The paper proposes a methodology for recognizing behavioural patterns of ADHD through gesture recognition, which can be seen as an application of AI. 
- cs.MM (Multimedia): The paper uses a multi-modal dataset of RGB plus Depth recordings for gesture recognition.
